metadata.dc:author: Fernández-Alvarez, E
metadata.dc:description: We analyze the main clinical characteristics of a series of 800 patients seen by us, who had movement disorders which had started during childhood. The results are compared with those movement disorders of adult onset reported in the literature.
metadata.dc:title: Frecuencia de los trastornos del movimiento en el niño.
[Frequency of movement disorders in children].
